name.en: Yemen Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation

description.en:
The Ministry of Planning and International Cooperation registers foreign non-profit and non-governmental organisations with a physical location and address in Yemen.

Organisations are granted a registration number that is provided on a certificate granting or renewing the license. 

This registration is renewed every two years but the number does not change. Registered organisations must re-register upon changing their name, logo, or nature of their activities.

access.guidanceOnLocatingIds: Ask the organisation to provide their 'Principal Cooperation Agreement'. The identifier will be provided as the Registration Number.

data.licenseDetails: No open dataset is available, no license on the Principal Cooperation Agreement
